Title: Environmental Assessment Module
Text:
Analysis of soil samples for spectral testing has been completed.
The results of this analysis were analyzed using Edodes grown on the site as the main sample reference:
① The soil moisture and organic matter content is high in this environment.
② The soil is contaminated with certain impurities.
③ ......
Summarizing the results of the above analysis, it can be concluded that the data of this site exceeds the criteria of livable environment and is not suitable as a new site.
